article.headline: Belmont 86, Jacksonville 71
article.story: JACKSONVILLE, Fla. (AP) -- Andy Wicke and Boomer Herndon scored 18 points each to lead Belmont to an 86-71 win over Jacksonville Thursday night. Wicke connected on 5-of-10 shots from beyond the arc, including four in the first half when he led the Bruins to a 51-30 halftime advantage. Belmont (19-9, 13-4 Atlantic Sun Conference) hit on 10-of-16 3-point baskets in the first half before cooling off in the final 20 minutes when it made just 3-of-13. Herndon, 6-10 center, connected on 8-of-9 shots from the floor, almost all of which were layups or rebounds. Belmont, which had 22 assists on its 30 baskets, connected on half of their 60 field goal attempts. Jacksonville only made 22 of its 57 field goal attempts (38.6 percent). The Bruins raced to a 25-8 lead in the first nine minutes, connecting on five of their first seven shots from beyond the arc. In the second half, Belmont took its largest lead of the game with 9 minutes left when it held a 28-point advantage at 76-48. Jacksonville made a brief rally with a 14-2 surge to cut the deficit to 16 at 78-62. The Bruins maintained at least a 15-point lead the rest of the game. Jacksonville (14-13, 10-7) was led by Jesse Kimbrough who made 5-of-14 baskets and finished with 13 points.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
